def_cn: （信息、测量、数据或仪器等）精确的，准确的
def_en: Accurate information, measurements, and statistics are correct to a very detailed level. An accurate instrument is able to give you information of this kind.

def_cn: （说法、描述）确切的，恰当的
def_en: An accurate statement or account gives a true or fair judgment of something.

def_cn: （行动、模仿）正确的，到位的
def_en: You can use accurate to describe the results of someone's actions when they do or copy something correctly or exactly.

def_cn: （武器、投掷）精准的；（人）射击（或投掷）准的
def_en: An accurate weapon or throw reaches the exact point or target that it was intended to reach. You can also describe a person as accurate if they fire a weapon or throw something in this way.
